column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The Tholl gourmand is licking his lips at some idle thought.
Search for the juvenile cliffmole.
Entice the juvenile cliffmole into the empty larder sack using a wriggling grub.
Deliver the full larder sack to the Tholl gourmand.

...Eh? What? Who? Oh! You're that <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>traveler</Case><Case(2)>traveler</Case><Case(3)>foreign dwarf</Case><Case(4)>traveler</Case><Case(5)>traveler</Case><Case(6)>traveler</Case><Case(7)>traveler</Case><Case(8)>traveler</Case></Switch> I keep hearing about!

...I mean, lali-ho! Almost forgot my manners there! Bad etiquette, that. Why don't I make up for it by cooking us a tasty steak <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>dinner<Else/>breakfast</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>lunch<Else/>dinner</If></If>, eh? I'm thinking a nice cut of cliffmole...
Aye, well, I suppose that sounds none too appetizing. And the meat of an adult cliffmole <Emphasis>is</Emphasis> about as pleasant as chewing on your grandma's second-favorite pair of boots.
A friend of mine, though, he reckons the younger moles are tender and juicy as they come! What say you? Shall we put that claim to the test?
Then we'll need to catch one first. The juveniles are said to stay near humid areas, like caves and streams. I'm more of a “cave” kind of dwarf, so you can search the waterways.
Oh, and they're apparently a skittish lot─you'll need a plump grub to lure one in before you can stuff it in a sack!
Right. There's your grub, and there's your sack. Meet me back here and we'll set the pan to sizzling!
The juvenile cliffmole eyes you warily. Time to show it the wriggling grub, then lure it into the sack...
<sniff> <sniff>
The cliffmole trundles happily into the sack and begins feasting on the grub...
Couldn't find me any of the small ones. What about you?
Would you look at that! And on your first try, too! I'll just get a fire going and─
Wait! Wait, wait, wait...
Th-Those big, round eyes... That lovable face! How could anyone eat such a precious dumpling!

...I can't do it! Not even for the best steak in the world! Have this coin for your trouble, but <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>dinner<Else/>breakfast</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>lunch<Else/>dinner</If></If>'s canceled!
From this day forward, I'll raise you as my own! I'll feed you, and pet you, and call you “Cliffy”!
